email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Hi team, just a quick reminder about the upcoming meeting tomorrow. Please be prepared with team updates.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: Thanks for the reminder, Alice. Bob will make sure to have Bob's presentation ready by then.

email_thread.author: carol@example.com
email_thread.message: Carol have a conflict during the meeting time, but Carol will send Carol's updates by the end of today.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: No worries, Carol. team will review Carol updates during the meeting.
